org.jlab.coda.xmsg.xsys.regdis

Class xMsgRegRepT

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jlab.coda.xmsg.xsys.regdis.xMsgRegDiscDriver
      • org.jlab.coda.xmsg.xsys.regdis.xMsgRegRepT
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class xMsgRegRepT
extends xMsgRegDiscDriver
implements java.lang.Runnable

    This is a thread that periodically updates xMsg front-end registration database with passed publishers and subscribers database contents. These passed databases (i.e. references) are xMsgNode resident databases, defined within the xMsgRegistrar class: xMsgRegistrationService This class will be instantiated by the xMsgRegistrar constructor executed by the xMsgNode: xMsgRegistrar This class inherits from xMsgRegDiscDriver where xMsg database communication methods are defined. todo: constructor parameter that defines update periodicity

    Since:
    1.0

      Constructor accepts the front-end host name (IP form) as well as two references to publishers and subscribers databases.
